Drinks.name: Cabernet Sauvignon. Red
Drinks.description: Cabernet Sauvignon is well known for its firm tannins and full and rich taste, including such notes as blackcurrant, as well as woodsy flavors, such as cedar, oak, and herbs. The wine also contains great potential for aging, thanks to its high rate of tannins and perceptible acidity.
recipe: A glass jar for fermentation (capacity of 1-2 gallons)
Plentiful supply of fruit (preferably red grapes)
